statements: SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, room_number, check_in_date FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT reservation_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE guest_id = '1234-5678';
SELECT reservation_id, guest_id, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE room_number = 101 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC, check_out_date ASC;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_id, room_number FROM reservations WHERE guest_id = '081af40b-8b32-4c25-af47-7d275e2e7868' ORDER BY check_in_date;
SELECT reservation_id, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE guest_id = '8f8d5bc8-81e5-4f15-9b04-63fdb9c28edb' AND special_requests LIKE '%ocean%';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_out_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY room_number, check_out_date;
SELECT guest_id, count(reservation_id) as total_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY guest_id HAVING count(reservation_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_reservations DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations ORDER BY check_in DESC;
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name FROM guest_profiles WHERE guest_id = 1001;
SELECT reservation_id, check_in, num_guests FROM reservations WHERE check_out >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE special_requests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT guest_id, email FROM guest_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM guest_profiles WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_in >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out < '2022-02-01';
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM guest_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'D%' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT guest_id, check_in, check_out, num_guests FROM reservations WHERE num_guests > 2 ORDER BY check_in DESC;
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, num_guests FROM guest_profiles JOIN reservations ON guest_profiles.guest_id = reservations.guest_id WHERE check_in < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_id, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_id, room_number FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM guest_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT reservation_id, request_text FROM special_requests ORDER BY request_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM guest_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NULL;

SELECT reservations.reservation_id, guest_profiles.first_name, guest_profiles.last_name, reservations.check_in_date, reservations.check_out_date FROM reservations JOIN guest_profiles ON reservations.guest_id = guest_profiles.guest_id;
SELECT reservations.room_number, special_requests.request_text FROM reservations LEFT JOIN special_requests ON reservations.reservation_id = special_requests.reservation_id;
SELECT guest_id, COUNT(reservation_id) AS total_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY guest_id ORDER BY total_reservations DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_id, first_name, last_name FROM guests ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT room_number, room_type, rate FROM rooms WHERE rate > 100;
SELECT guest_id, COUNT(reservation_id) AS num_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY guest_id;
SELECT request_description FROM requests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE guest_id = 123;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM guests ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT room_number, room_type, rate FROM rooms WHERE rate < 150.00;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_id, check_in FROM reservations WHERE check_in >= '2021-08-01';
SELECT r.reservation_id, r.guest_id, g.first_name, g.last_name FROM reservations r JOIN guests g ON r.guest_id = g.guest_id;
SELECT * FROM Reservations;
SELECT guest_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Guests ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SpecialRequests WHERE request_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT room_type, price FROM Rooms WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM Guests WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE check_in_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT room_type, price FROM Rooms ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Guests WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT r.reservation_id, g.first_name, g.last_name, b.booking_date FROM Reservations r JOIN Guests g ON r.guest_id = g.guest_id JOIN Bookings b ON r.reservation_id = b.reservation_id;
